title: Juniper Networks security advisory (AV25-275)
description: On May 9 and 13, 2025, Juniper Networks published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in multiple products. Included were updates for the following products:
products: Juniper Secure Analytics  versions 7.5.0 to versions prior to 7.5.0 UP11 IF02
Junos OS Evolved  versions 22.3R1 and later
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
